long_description: With a beautiful hand and great-fitting 4-way stretch, the REI Northway skirt is perfect for traveling near and far. Easy-care polyester is blended with a touch of elastane for the perfect fit and drape. Tunneled elastic in the waistband ensures a comfortable, stable fit. Concealed zip security pocket at left front waistband stashes a key or credit card. Cute tuck detail at asymmetrically placed seam. REI Northway skirt has a classic, easy-wearing fit.
short_description: With a beautiful hand and great-fitting 4-way stretch, the REI Northway skirt is perfect for traveling near and far.
